name: Vchau-AdColony-Adapters
summary: AdColony Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Interstitial, Rewarded Video.

To download and integrate the AdColony SDK, please check this tutorial: https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/AdColony-iOS-SDK-3/wiki. 


For inquiries and support, please email support@adcolony.com.
